role.argrole: instrument, thing hit by or with

arg.g: with another size of 200 meter long and so on...

example.arg: bi- AlHajomi lawoHAti- hi mitorK murab~aEK li- EaroDi karokalA Aljadiydi layolapK wa- layolapK wa- -bi- AlsuroEapi naf~aXa AlS~ayofa AlmADiya lawoHapF EimolAqapK min OamotArK murab~aEapK fiy Oaqal~a min sAEapK li Oay~Ami raOosi Almatoni AlOuwlaY li- Alrasomi wa- AlnaHoti
